content:
âœ… **IMPLEMENTED**: XML Documentation Added

**Changes Made:**
```diff
- [JsonProperty("user_id")]
- public string UserId { get; init; }
+ /// <summary>
+ /// The unique identifier of the user who owns this card collection entry.
+ /// </summary>
+ [JsonProperty("user_id")]
+ public string UserId { get; init; }
```

**Impact:** Enhanced IDE IntelliSense support and improved code maintainability. Added comprehensive XML documentation to all properties in both `UserCardItem` and `CollectedItem` classes.

**Verification:** Documentation comments are now visible in IDE tooltips when hovering over properties.
